breakpoint.description: Indicates breakpoint at which to switch between horizontal menu and vertical dropdown

breakpointReference.description: A container reference to base the specified breakpoint on instead of the viewport width. (Type: HTMLElement | (() => HTMLElement) | React.RefObject<any>)

children.description: Any elements that can be rendered in the menu (Type: any)

className.description: Additional classes added to the OverflowMenu.
